attributes.action: help with the cost of weight loss groups/gyms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government goes on about obesity in the country, yet no help is given with reducing the cost of weight loss groups or gym membership. As a person who needs to loose some weight and has had access to a gym free for 16 weeks, i would love to continue going, however the cost might prevent me from keeping it up. Why can't us people get some help with the costs of these services, smokers get help...
